name: Lotion samurai
description:
"About this game"
Operate the samurai covered with lotion to escape from Ninja Castle!
However, I can not walk because I slip with lotion.
By kicking the wall, you can take advantage of the slickness, slip through the enemy's attack, and head to the exit!

"Game features"
・ If you hit an enemy, you can cut it, so you can concentrate on your escape while enjoying the pleasure of defeating.
・ Unprecedented sprint feeling due to the fusion of lotion and samurai! Kill many ninjas and escape at super high speed!
・ Learn the terrain, refine your acceleration techniques, and repaint the rankings!
・ Aim to escape from the Ninja Castle by capturing 6 unique stages!
